department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: oval body with small spout protruding from the upper left corner of one end; body colors of silver, gold, and copper; decorated with vine patterns between pictorial medallions; images of fish and snakes circle the top opening; double chain links both ends; contains both Hebrew and Islamic writing on exterior

title: Eternal Lamp
